taskDescription: Anethole, C10H12O, a major constituent of the oil of anise, has the 1H NMR spectrum shown. On careful oxidation with Na2Cr2O7, anethole yields p-methoxybenzoic acid. What is the structure of anethole? Assign all peaks in the NMR spectrum, and account for the observed splitting patterns.
